SEARCH
Package edu.carroll.initMusic.service

Interface SongService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SongServiceImpl
public interface SongService
Defines methods related to searching for songs

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearRepo()
    Clears all songs from the repository.
    long
    getRepoSize()
    Retrieves the number of songs currently stored in the song repository.
    String
    getSongPreview(Long id)
    Gets the preview link for the given id
    boolean
    isValidQuery(String query)
    Checks if the given query is valid according to given standards
    Set<Song>
    searchForSongs(String songName, String artistName)
    Searches for songs related to the given query

  • Method Details

    • searchForSongs

      Set<Song> searchForSongs(String songName, String artistName)
      Searches for songs related to the given query
      Parameters:
      songName - Name of song to look for
      artistName - Name of artist to look for
      Returns:
      Set of songs related to the query, empty set if no songs found

    • isValidQuery

      boolean isValidQuery(String query)
      Checks if the given query is valid according to given standards
      Parameters:
      query - Query to check if valid
      Returns:
      true if query is valid, false otherwise.

    • getRepoSize

      long getRepoSize()
      Retrieves the number of songs currently stored in the song repository.
      Returns:
      the size of the song repository.

    • clearRepo

      void clearRepo()
      Clears all songs from the repository. This is primarily useful for testing or resetting data.

    • getSongPreview

      String getSongPreview(Long id)
      Gets the preview link for the given id
      Parameters:
      id - id to get preview for
      Returns:
      String of URL
